def_cn: (演出的)终场，最后一幕;(音乐的)终曲，末乐章;(一系列演出)最后一场
def_en: The finale of a show, piece of music, or series of shows is the last part of it or the last one of them, especially when this is exciting or impressive.
If you say that an event provides a particular kind of finale to something, you mean that it provides it with a particular kind of ending.
